original: Burman, Joban Elov, bankdirektör, Jönköping, f. 29/4/91 i Sundsvall av fabr. J. B. o. Brita Högbom. G. m. Agnes Sångberg. Barn: Maj-Britta Kristina f. 19, Kjell Elov Emanuel 29. — Mog:ex. i Sundsvall 08, kommers, utbildn. i Engl, Tyskl o. Frankr. 08-11. Anst. v. A-B Sundsvalls Hand:-bank 11-14, Sydsv. Kredit A-B 14-22, A-’B Sydsv. Banken (num. Skånska Banken) 22-31, dir. o. st>T:led. v. avd:kont. i Jönköp. sed. 31. Äger Älghyttans skogsegend. rn. kolugn i Or-maryd. Ordf. i styr. f. A-B Hapeco i Malmö o. v. ordf. i styr. f. Jönköp. orkesterfören. Hobby: musik.
translated: Burman, Joban Elov, bank director, Jönköping, b. April 29, 1891 in Sundsvall to manufacturer J.B. and Brita Högbom. Married to Agnes Sångberg. Children: Maj-Britta Kristina b. 1919, Kjell Elov Emanuel b. 1929. Graduated from high school in Sundsvall in 1908, commercial education in England, Germany and France from 1908-1911. Employed by A-B Sundsvalls Handelsbank from 1911-1914, Sydsvenska Kredit AB from 1914-1922, A-B Sydsvenska Banken (now Skånska Banken) from 1922-1931, director and head of department in Jönköping since 1931. Owns Älghyttans forest property and a charcoal kiln in Ormaryd. Chairman of the board of A-B Hapeco in Malmö and vice chairman of the board of Jönköping Orchestra Association. Hobby: music.
